refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: levels=statelevels(x, nbins, method, bounds) [levels histogram]=statelevels(x, nbins, method, bounds) [levels histogram bins]=statelevels(x, nbins, method, bounds) [levels histogram bins]=statelevels(x, nbins, method, bounds, 'fig', On or Off)

listitem.para: number of histogram bins to use in the histogram as a positive scalar, where the default value is 100
method to estimate the statelevels using specified METHOD as one of 'mean' or 'mode', where the default value is 'mode'
specify the lower and upper bound for the histogram as a two-element row vector
specify the logical input value to display figure as one of 'on' or 'off', where the default input in 'off'.
return lower and upper level values

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: x=[1.2, 5, 10, -20, 12] nbins=10 method='mode' bounds=[1 10] levels=statelevels(x, nbins, method, bounds)
